H0.text: who inspired obama. Martin Luther King Jr.

A4.text: Alinsky biographer Sanford Horwitt, saw the influence of Alinsky's teaching not only on Obama's work in Chicago but also on his successful 2008 presidential run.

A5.text: He also expressed the view that 'Alinsky understated the degree to which people's hopes and dreams and their ideals and their values were just as important in organizing as people's self-interest.'
